entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 a.m. MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains this morning and early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
